EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for registering for the Pivotal Customer Advisory Board. Please see event details below.
Date & Time: 22 February 2017, 8:30 AM–8:00 PM Location: Equinox Skysuite, Swissôtel The Stamford, 2 Stamford Rd, Singapore 178882
Questions? Please email Jade Tan <[[mailto:jtan@pivotal.io]]>.
